bibl.title: Playing around Aristophanes. Essays in Celebration of the Completion of the Edition of the Comedies of Aristophanes by Allan Sommerstein
bibl.note: Non vidimus. Cf. Gnomon 79 (2007), Bibl. Beilage 3, p. 73.
STOREY Ian, On First Looking into Kratinos' Dionysalexandros.
Lynn KOZAK and John RICH (Edd.), Playing around Aristophanes. Essays in Celebration of the Completion of the Edition of the Comedies of Aristophanes by Allan Sommerstein (Oxford, 2006) pp. 105-125.
